name: The Escape (itch) (Redstoneinvente)
description:
It is a small horror game concpt where you have 10 minutes to survive. In that 10 minutes you only need to hide from the evil zombie. This is a concept only so no intense gameplay. You need to explore the house and try to hide from the evil.

The game will be updated to add more features in the future.

Sub to me on YT : Redstoneinvente Armored Guy
